org.sxb.kit.io

クラス ClassPathResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.kit.io.AbstractResource
      • org.sxb.kit.io.AbstractFileResolvingResource
        • org.sxb.kit.io.ClassPathResource
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    InputStreamSource, Resource

    public class ClassPathResource
extends AbstractFileResolvingResource
    Resource implementation for class path resources. Uses either a given ClassLoader or a given Class for loading resources.

    Supports resolution as java.io.File if the class path resource resides in the file system, but not for resources in a JAR. Always supports resolution as URL.

    導入されたバージョン:
    28.12.2003
    作成者:
    Juergen Hoeller, Sam Brannen
    関連項目:
    ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(String), Class.getResourceAsStream(String)

    • コンストラクタの概要

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      ClassPathResource(java.lang.String path)
      Create a new ClassPathResource for ClassLoader usage.
      ClassPathResource(java.lang.String path, java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
      Create a new ClassPathResource for Class usage.
      ClassPathResource(java.lang.String path, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Create a new ClassPathResource for ClassLoader usage.

      This implementation creates a ClassPathResource, applying the given path relative to the path of the underlying resource of this descriptor.

      This implementation compares the underlying class path locations.
      boolean exists()
      This implementation checks for the resolution of a resource URL.

      Return the ClassLoader that this resource will be obtained from.

      This implementation returns a description that includes the class path location.

      This implementation returns the name of the file that this class path resource refers to.
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
      This implementation opens an InputStream for the given class path resource.

      Return the path for this resource (as resource path within the class path).
      java.net.URL getURL()
      This implementation returns a URL for the underlying class path resource, if available.
      int hashCode()

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド org.sxb.kit.io.AbstractFileResolvingResource

        contentLength, getFile, isReadable, lastModified

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド org.sxb.kit.io.AbstractResource

        getURI, isOpen, toString

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • ClassPathResource

        public ClassPathResource(java.lang.String path)
        Create a new ClassPathResource for ClassLoader usage. A leading slash will be removed, as the ClassLoader resource access methods will not accept it.

        The thread context class loader will be used for loading the resource.

        パラメータ:
        path - the absolute path within the class path
        関連項目:
        ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(String), org.springframework.util.ClassKits#getDefaultClassLoader()

      • ClassPathResource

        public ClassPathResource(java.lang.String path,
                         java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Create a new ClassPathResource for ClassLoader usage. A leading slash will be removed, as the ClassLoader resource access methods will not accept it.
        パラメータ:
        path - the absolute path within the classpath
        classLoader - the class loader to load the resource with, or null for the thread context class loader
        関連項目:
        ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(String)

      • ClassPathResource

        public ClassPathResource(java.lang.String path,
                         java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Create a new ClassPathResource for Class usage. The path can be relative to the given class, or absolute within the classpath via a leading slash.
        パラメータ:
        path - relative or absolute path within the class path
        clazz - the class to load resources with
        関連項目:
        Class.getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String)

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getPath

        public final java.lang.String getPath()
        Return the path for this resource (as resource path within the class path).

      • getClassLoader

        public final java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader()
        Return the ClassLoader that this resource will be obtained from.

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        This implementation checks for the resolution of a resource URL.
        定義:
        exists インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        exists クラス内 AbstractFileResolvingResource
        関連項目:
        ClassLoader.getResource(String), Class.getResource(String)

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        This implementation opens an InputStream for the given class path resource.
        戻り値:
        the input stream for the underlying resource (must not be null)
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if the stream could not be opened
        関連項目:
        ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(String), Class.getResourceAsStream(String)

      • getURL

        public java.net.URL getURL()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This implementation returns a URL for the underlying class path resource, if available.
        定義:
        getURL インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        getURL クラス内 AbstractResource
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if the resource cannot be resolved as URL, i.e. if the resource is not available as descriptor
        関連項目:
        ClassLoader.getResource(String), Class.getResource(String)

      • createRelative

        public Resource createRelative(java.lang.String relativePath)
        This implementation creates a ClassPathResource, applying the given path relative to the path of the underlying resource of this descriptor.
        定義:
        createRelative インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        createRelative クラス内 AbstractResource
        パラメータ:
        relativePath - the relative path (relative to this resource)
        戻り値:
        the resource handle for the relative resource
        関連項目:
        org.springframework.util.StringKits#applyRelativePath(String, String)

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()
        This implementation returns the name of the file that this class path resource refers to.
        定義:
        getFilename インタフェース内 Resource
        オーバーライド:
        getFilename クラス内 AbstractResource
        関連項目:
        org.springframework.util.StringKits#getFilename(String)

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        This implementation returns a description that includes the class path location.
        関連項目:
        Object.toString()

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        This implementation compares the underlying class path locations.
        オーバーライド:
        equals クラス内 AbstractResource
        関連項目:
        Resource.getDescription()

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        This implementation returns the hash code of the underlying class path location.
        オーバーライド:
        hashCode クラス内 AbstractResource
        関連項目:
        Resource.getDescription()
